text:
="preserve">Li Jijun (, October 9, 1933 – July 21, 2020), was a Chinese geographer and geomorphologist. He was born in Pengzhou, Sichuan. In 1991, he was elected as a member of the Chinese Academy of Sciences. He was a professor of Geography Department of Lanzhou University and a Dean of the Geography Department of Lanzhou University.
Li died on July 21, 2020 in Lanzhou, Gansu at the age of 87.
